channel.title: [718] Nexus Problems (Simple question)
channel.description:
Nexus seems to be set up different from other 718's, so I'm a bit lost. How do I add npc's? and how do I make it so it pops up saying like
[News]: Sample Text 1 [News]: Sample text 2
In the chatbox
Sorry if I seem like an idiot, I'm just new to the nexus source.

item.title: [718] Nexus Problems (Simple question)
item.dc:creator: @Impactz Impactz
item.description:
@Impactz wrote:

[quote=“V 1 N C H, post:1, topic:465331”]Nexus seems to be set up different from other 718’s, so I’m a bit lost. How do I add npc’s? and how do I make it so it pops up saying like

[News]: Sample Text 1
[News]: Sample text 2

In the chatbox

Sorry if I seem like an idiot, I’m just new to the nexus source.[/quote]

Npc’s ->

Nexus Source -> Data -> Npcs -> unpackedSpawnsList -> Add there exaple:

//Mr ex home
3709 - 2655 2657 0

3709 = NPC ID

2655 2657 0 = COORDS

Server Message’s (google -> Cheap Server Messages 718)

Tell me your webclient if you host (I made nexus xD)

Read full topic
